page.title: 07TRINITY SCHOOL SUMMER FETE
page.content: There was a{horse}outside with 2 slip- pery rollers. Corinna stayed on for 1 minute & got her money back. At Mum's grocery{tombola}I paid 10p to have a go. I got a mouse purse, put my money in it, & went to the{toy & bookstall but bought nothing. Back with Mum on the tombola I won a plastic bracelet. I listened to the{School Ceilidh band getting ready to play. There was a lot of crashing & banging.People were get- ting ready for the{Fancy Dress.}Some little ones had all won lollies; red outside, yellow in the middle. Next door you had to{knock down tins}with ping-pong balls but the balls were light & bounced everywhere. In anoth- er game,{Hit the Rat,}you had to get the rat in its tummy between 2 tunnels ...I bought plants for Dad & Mum who said, 'Let's go home!' so I went home with all my prizes & presents.
